Source code for DBWS Advanced example: how to run under OSGi
http://wiki.eclipse.org/EclipseLink/Development/DBWS/OSGi

P.S.
The source code for the 'spi fix' cannot be checked into the Eclipse
Foundation's SVN repository since it under the GPL license (not EPL).
Please see http://mwnorman.blogspot.com/2010/09/overriding-built-in-java-httpserver.html
for more details.
